response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with a range of features that will enhance your experience and make your life easier. Given its high quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $100. However, I understand your valuation and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in purchasing this product for $120? This is a special offer tailored for you, and I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 120}
